name: Vanadium(III) chloride
desc: Vanadium trichloride is the inorganic compound with the formula VCl3. This purple salt is a common precursor to other vanadium(III) complexes.

images.alt: Plan view of a single layer in the crystal structure of vanadium(III) chloride

Other anions: vanadium trifluoride, vanadium(III) sulfide, vanadium tribromide
Other cations: titanium trichloride, chromium(III) chloride, niobium trichloride, tantalum trichloride
